Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the dragon made with ferrous weapons or ammunition have disadvantage. The area within 15 feet of the dragon is difficult terrain for creatures wearing ferrous armour.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes two attacks: one with its Bite and one with its Claws, or two with its Sword Shot.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
The dragon can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

[[/item r1guKcST287BpNp0]]{Detect}. The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

[[/item fjXgI7oZhikGQm1v]]{Sword Shot}. The dragon makes a Sword Shot attack.

[[/item LkFSv0aRPnaCxKFB]]{Blood Bend (Costs 2 Actions)}. The dragon exerts its magnetic control over the iron in creatures’ blood. Each creature of the dragon’s choice that contains blood and is within 5 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 5 feet in a direction of the dragon’s choice and knocked prone. A creature wearing ferrous armour has disadvantage on this saving throw. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft. , one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Detect.name: 侦查
Detect.description: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

The dragon uses its claws.

Sword Shot.name: Sword Shot
Sword Shot.description: The dragon makes a Sword Shot attack.

8oWx4vGcFge8hZlc.name: Sword Shot
8oWx4vGcFge8hZlc.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/120 ft. , one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

The dragon attacks with its sword shot.

Blood Bend.name: Blood Bend
Blood Bend.description:
The dragon exerts its magnetic control over the iron in creatures’ blood. Each creature of the dragon’s choice that contains blood and is within 5 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 5 feet in a direction of the dragon’s choice and knocked prone. A creature wearing ferrous armour has disadvantage on this saving throw. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

The dragon exerts its magnetic control over the iron in your blood, make a Strength saving throw!

Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6).name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6)
Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6).description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-reign-of-iron.Actor.0aq0LRNMdb8VCx4O.Item.AB4XsQkOsiSueSUa]{Storm Of Swords}. The dragon fires a torrent of sharp metal objects in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.actors-heliana-reign-of-iron.Actor.0aq0LRNMdb8VCx4O.Item.cM7R2eyVgMcpUnes]{Repulsion Breath}. The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed up to 40 feet away from the dragon. A creature wearing ferrous armour has disadvantage on this saving throw.

Storm Of Swords.name: Storm Of Swords
Storm Of Swords.description:
The dragon fires a torrent of sharp metal objects in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The dragon uses storm of swords, make a Dexterity saving throw!

Repulsion Breath.name: 斥力吐息
Repulsion Breath.description:
The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed up to 40 feet away from the dragon. A creature wearing ferrous armour has disadvantage on this saving throw.

The dragon uses repulsion breath, make a Strength saving throw!

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the dragon takes 5 or more fire damage in a single instance, its flying speed is reduced by 30 feet until the end of its next turn. If its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet, it immediately falls 100 feet, and falls a further 100 feet at the start of its next turn.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the dragon made with ferrous weapons or ammunition have &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}. The area within 20 feet of the dragon is difficult terrain for creatures wearing ferrous armour.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its @UUID[Actor.LrCMtQoferyf2fWw.Item.w6aO4l2B92r7Anbs]{Bite} and two with its @UUID[Actor.LrCMtQoferyf2fWw.Item.pKSSsOCyMl9OK15x]{Claws}, or three with its @UUID[Actor.LrCMtQoferyf2fWw.Item.rCu5AWaUTctH691V]{Sword Shot}.

Magnetite Golem.name: Magnetite Golem
Magnetite Golem.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Cold Absorption.name: 霜寒吸收
Cold Absorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

Immutable Form.name: 不变形态
Immutable Form.description: 魔像免疫任何可以改变其形态的法术或效应。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 魔像对抗法术和其他魔法效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Magic Weapons.name: Magic Weapons
Magic Weapons.description: 魔像的武器攻击视为魔法攻击。

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+13 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

The golem attacks with its Slam.

Sword.name: 剑刃
Sword.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+13 to hit,, 10 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) slashing damage.

The golem attacks with its Sword.

Poison Breath.name: 毒性吐息
Poison Breath.description:
The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the weapon made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the weapon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal weapon.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description:
The weapon makes two melee attacks. It has one of the following attack options, depending on its anatomy.

  • @UUID[Actor.38YEnHDMUUXUSjjm.Item.WCQcyIHAG3zmVTn7]{Greatsword}

  • @UUID[Actor.38YEnHDMUUXUSjjm.Item.aJCqh1XaLOHoSPDa]{Maul}

  • @UUID[Actor.38YEnHDMUUXUSjjm.Item.3v2J0SER4FKtqmDo]{Pike}

Greatsword.name: Greatsword
Greatsword.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Maul.name: 锤击
Maul.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Pike.name: Pike
Pike.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the weapon takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls &reference[prone]{prone} and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Ng6VLzBfHszaBKnC.name: Magnetite Golem
Ng6VLzBfHszaBKnC.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Cold Absorption.name: 霜寒吸收
Cold Absorption.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

Immutable Form.name: 不变形态
Immutable Form.description: 魔像免疫任何可以改变其形态的法术或效应。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The golem has &reference[advantage]{advantage} on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Magic Weapons.name: Magic Weapons
Magic Weapons.description: 魔像的武器攻击视为魔法攻击。

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Sword.name: 剑刃
Sword.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.reach]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Poison Breath.name: 毒性吐息
Poison Breath.description: 魔像呼出毒气形成一片 15 尺锥状区域。该区域内的每个生物必须进行一次[[/save]]豁免，豁免失败则受到[[/damage average]]伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。

Dragonling.name: Dragonling
Dragonling.description:
Foundry Note: Assign the Dragonling's Challenge Rating (CR) to your Tamer level for the correct proficiency bonus.

I did mein best to downplay ze greed tendencies but zese adorable drakes just kan’t help zemselves. If you need ein hot töddy or kold beer in a giffy, chuck von a gold or silver koin und vatch it get to vurk!

— Humperdink, Hot Chocolate Aficionado

Type: Dragon

Creature Component: Any Dragon

Bonus Tamer Improvement: @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-reign-of-iron.Item.gLrHYg0cNGPhggOh]{Growth I} and +2 Hit Dice

Like a dragon, but a little less greedy and a little more pliant, dragonlings are Humperdink’s attempt at retaining a dragon’s useful characteristics and limiting the more… tyrannical ones. Able to shift its makeup depending on the metals to which it is exposed, the dragonling is an adaptable, if distractable, companion.

If any of the dragonling's traits or actions require saving throws, it is always against the dragonling's save DC, as calculated below.

Save DC = 8 + the tamer’s proficiency bonus + the Dragonling's Constitution modifier

Dragonling Improvements

Greedy.name: 贪得无厌
Greedy.description: Whenever the dragonling first detects treasure worth 100 gp or more that isn’t being worn or carried, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or get distracted. While distracted, it spends its movement and actions trying to get close to, and frolic in, the treasure. A distracted dragonling repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success and becoming immune to the allure of that treasure for the next 24 hours.

Metallic Character.name: Metallic Character
Metallic Character.description: When the dragonling’s tamer finishes a long rest, the dragonling gains an affinity for the element associated with the first precious metal it touches. This affinity grants the dragonling resistance to that damage type and lasts until its tamer next finishes a long rest. Copper gives acid affinity, gold gives fire, and magnetite & silver give cold.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the dragon made with ferrous weapons or ammunition have &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}. The area within 30 feet of the dragon is difficult terrain for creatures wearing ferrous armour.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its @UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.XWjcvUPeV15YQ4Pw]{Bite} and two with its @UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.6iEuMXll1L5ous5X]{Claws}, or three with its @UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.tfJOtd1E2gIqeEIt]{Sword Shot}.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the dragon takes 15 or more fire damage in a single instance, its flying speed is reduced by 30 feet until the end of its next turn. If its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet, it immediately falls 100 feet, and falls a further 100 feet at the start of its next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: Legendary Actions
Legendary Actions.description:
The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

@UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.5FgCPAjGTJfZ7uSx]{Detect}

@Embed[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.5FgCPAjGTJfZ7uSx inline]{Detect}

@UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.93pwiM4ZLaCT3iEx]{Sword Shot}

@Embed[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.93pwiM4ZLaCT3iEx inline]{Sword Shot}

@UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.tCfrKjoixTiz0Oop]{Blood Bend}

@Embed[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.tCfrKjoixTiz0Oop inline]{Blood Bend}

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Repulsion Breath.name: 斥力吐息
Repulsion Breath.description: The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]]. On a failed save, the creature is pushed up to 60 feet away from the dragon. A creature wearing ferrous armour has &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage} on this saving throw.

Storm Of Swords.name: Storm Of Swords
Storm Of Swords.description: The dragon fires a torrent of sharp metal objects in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6).name: Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6)
Breath Weapons (Recharge 5–6).description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

@UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.jZNTECQmeK1zmLVA]{Storm Of Swords}

@Embed[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.jZNTECQmeK1zmLVA inline]{Storm Of Swords}

@UUID[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.1KM93V23m0wqvNYL]{Repulsion Breath}

@Embed[Actor.h89mWsXvHm9XPOf5.Item.1KM93V23m0wqvNYL inline]{Repulsion Breath}

Blood Bend (2 Actions).name: Blood Bend (2 Actions)
Blood Bend (2 Actions).description: The dragon exerts its magnetic control over the iron in creatures’ blood. Each creature of the dragon’s choice that contains blood and is within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be moved up to 15 feet in a direction of the dragon’s choice and knocked &reference[prone]{prone}. A creature wearing ferrous armour has &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage} on this saving throw. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

Detect.name: 侦查
Detect.description: The dragon makes a [[/check]] check.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

tfJOtd1E2gIqeEIt.name: Sword Shot
tfJOtd1E2gIqeEIt.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range [[lookup @item.range.value]]/[[lookup @item.range.long]] ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage

Swarm.name: Swarm
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny utensil. The swarm can’t regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Jabs.name: Jabs
Jabs.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target in the swarm’s space. Hit: [[/damage activity=Mkegz72BuB9NimGT average]] damage or [[/damage activity=eMeRdMSsTSypwPUz average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the swarm made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the swarm takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls &reference[prone]{prone} and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the weapon made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at disadvantage.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the weapon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal weapon.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The weapon makes two melee attacks. It has one of the following attack options, depending on its anatomy.

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

The weapon attacks with its greatsword.

Maul.name: 锤击
Maul.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

The weapon attacks with its maul.

Pike.name: 长矛
Pike.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft. , one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

The weapon attacks with its pike.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the weapon takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls prone and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the armour made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the armour remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a pile of armour plates.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the armour takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls &reference[prone]{prone} and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The armour makes two melee attacks or casts @UUID[Actor.V0uaNtPBJuQWxylE.Item.8jR0Y7lfklzpeajw]{Magnetobolt} twice.

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Magnetobolt.name: Magnetobolt
Magnetobolt.description: Ranged Spell Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range [[lookup @item.range.value]] ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage and the target must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or be knocked &reference[prone]{prone}. A creature wearing ferrous armour makes this saving throw with &reference[disadvantage]{disadvantage}.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny utensil. The swarm can’t regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Jabs.name: Jabs
Jabs.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft. , one target in the swarm’s space. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

The swarm attacks with its jab.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the swarm made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at disadvantage.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the swarm takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls prone and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.name: Arcanomagnetic Repulsion
Arcanomagnetic Repulsion.description: Attacks against the armour made with ferrous weapons or ammunition are made at disadvantage.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While the armour remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a pile of armour plates.

Superconductor.name: Superconductor
Superconductor.description: If the armour takes 10 or more fire damage in a single instance, it falls prone and, until the end of its next turn, it is incapacitated and its flying speed is reduced to 0 feet.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The armour makes two melee attacks or casts Magnetobolt twice.

Greatsword.name: 巨剑
Greatsword.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) force damage.

The armour attacks with its greatsword.

Magnetobolt.name: Magnetobolt
Magnetobolt.description:
Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 90 ft. , one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) force damage and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. A creature wearing ferrous armour makes this saving throw with disadvantage.

The armour uses Magnetobolt, make a Strength saving throw!
